nodes.text: The Cytocaves of Nora were a location where genetic engineering took place. When speaking of genetic farming in regards to a child who was wanted by members of an Imperial remnant in 9 ABY, the Ugnaught Kuiil remarked that the ex-shock trooper Carasynthia Dune looked as if she was farmed in the Cytocaves of Nora.

The Cytocaves of Nora were mentioned in "Chapter 7: The Reckoning," an episode of the first season of Jon Favreau's television series The Mandalorian. The episode was written by Favreau and aired on Disney+ on December 18, 2019.
